name: Easy Yet Romantic Filet Mignon
author: chef in the making
summary: This recipe is very simple and very delicious also. I can prepare it, and I am a 14 year old boy! This recipe only takes a few minutes to prepare and only a bit longer in the broiler. This goes good with some mashed potatoes with butter and green beans with lemon squeezed on top. This is good, trust me!
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) (1 inch thick) filet mignon steaks
directions: Place oven rack in its highest position
Rub steaks all over with olive oil
Sprinkle with onion powder, then with salt and pepper
Wrap one slice of bacon around each steak, and secure with a toothpick
Place steaks onto a broiler pan, and broil for 5 to 7 minutes
Turn the steaks over, and sprinkle the tops with shallots
Broil for an additional 5 to 7 minutes, or until the steaks are cooked to your liking
